version_description:
Thank you for choosing Device Monitor²! We always do our best to make the app faster, more stable and easier to use.
Update to the latest version to discover all the new features.
This version contains the following changes:
• added full support for iOS 15 and iPadOS 15;
• fixed app interface problems when used in split view on iPad.

Do you like our app? Tell us your opinion, it can help us improve the application! Remember that we listen to the feedback from each of you!
